idea:
It's in the wild that true beauty lies. The wild is pure, untampered and honest. At 'Wild Earth' we believe in creating products in sync with nature. We strive to retain the goodness of ingredients in our products without tampering with their purity or simplicity. Our products are free from sulphates & parabens and packed with only what's good for you and your skin.


All 'Wild Products' are handcrafted, natural and eco friendly. Transparency is very important to us and you will always know what ingredients go in each of our products. The only ingredient not listed is Love which is sprinkled lavishly on all our products. However, we promise you will feel that love whilst using 'Wild Earth' products.


Wild Earth is a socially conscious organisation and believes in giving back to society. A significant part of our earnings from the sale of 'Wild Earth' products goes towards supporting 'The Bluebells Community', a community dedicated to bringing smiles on the faces of the underprivileged. We thank you for being a part of this lovely cause by using our products.
name: Hyacinth Sustainable Solutions Pvt Ltd

idea: BNG Advisors Private Limited is a company incorporated to provide professional services especially in the management and business consulting sector with an innovative edge and looking to solve problems.
name: BNG ADVISORS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: We manufacture various kinds of Chemical Process Equipments for Pharmaceutical, Agrochemical, Paints & Dyes, Chemicals, Breweries, Food Processing and Biochemical Industries. Equipments like Reactors, Pressure Vessels, Columns, Heat Exchangers, Autoclaves, Silos, Tanks in Stainless Steel. Click here to know our full potential.
name: SAIRAM ENGINEERING WORKS

idea: Wright Research is a quantitative active investment firm dedicated to helping investors reach their investment goals and navigate the risks of investing through strong technological and investment acumen.
name: WRYGHT RESEARCH & CAPITAL PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: TreeWear's aim is to create products that are good for people as well as the Planet. For trees that are being cut down, TreeWear aims to create awareness, plant brand new trees & make innovative eco-friendly products to help you make the shift to a greener, more natural lifestyle with ease.
name: TreeWear

idea:
RWAMP STUDIO - 'ARCHITECTURE+TECHNOLGY'


 Based in 'Mumbai & Bangalore'  it is a creative Architectural Design embedded with immersive technology to cater the future requirements & making the social environment more smart, experiential, multi-sensory, convenience & for betterment of human life. We believe that design has no compartments: we work within the fields of 'Masterplanning, Architecture, Museums & Experience centers, Interior design, Landscape design, Product design & even research & development, constantly broadening our horizons. Established in 2015, our mission is the 'New era teaching & advanced learning system which enables the society to get inspired by 'ARCH+TECH'.


Currently  working on a couple Museum/Experience designs, with integrated 'design & technology' (Augmented Reality ,Virtual Reality, Robotics), R & D, content making.
name: RWAMP STUDIO

idea: VanRam Solutions Pvt Ltd was incorporated in May 2018 to attempt elimination of health hazards of chemical induced products in our regular consumption like edible oils. Our intention is to provide natural & chemical free products impacting well-being of humans, animals and environment. To begin with, we have started our operations in making cold pressed edible oil available in transparent manner. We have been effectively operational in Mumbai from last 14 months. Our core belief is ‘Seeing is Believing’ hence transparency in our operations like extracting oil in the retail shop itself for the customers to see ensures purity and Freshness of the oil.
name: VANRAM SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Company is incorporated under the Companies Act 2013 to provide the green energy solutions for Renewable Energy
name: VADAJAR RENEWABLE ENERGY PRIVATE LIMITED
